name: chicory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a European plant with blue flowers, whose leaves, flowers, and root can be used in cooking: There are many varieties of edible weed such as dandelion and chicory. Try nasturtium, borage, or chicory flowers sprinkled on salads.
Alexan2008/ iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a powder made from the root of this plant and added to or used instead of coffee: The coffee is very poor quality, mostly chicory.
UK a plant with thick, pale leaves that taste bitter and that are eaten cooked as a vegetable or in salads: I like to grill red or white chicory to go with the meat. Synonym
endive
EVAfotografie/ iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a plant with curly green leaves that are eaten uncooked in salads: I enjoy robust greens such as chicory and watercress. Synonym
frisée
